name: XXX-COM
description:
XXX-COM failed to stop the AI invasion and humanity surrenders, you controls a small resistance movement fighting against the AI conquerors.

How To Play:

Camera Movement : W , A , S , D

Camera Rotate: Q , E

Camera Zoom In/Out : Mouse Scroll

Selected Unit and Pick Movement Action with MouseLeft Click

Try to break into enemies' server room and implanted virus
